text: Pascal Hervé (13 July 1964 – 24 December 2024) was a French road racing cyclist. He competed in the individual road race at the 1992 Summer Olympics. He raced as a professional from 1994 to 2001. He was born in Tours, France. Hervé died on 24 December 2024 in Montreal, Canada at the age of 60. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2024 deaths Category:French cyclists Category:Olympians for France Category:People from Tours
title: Pascal Hervé
